properties.areaDesc: Geneva-on-the-Lake to Conneaut OH; Conneaut OH to Ripley NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 10:00AM EST until February 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 knots with gusts up to 40
knots tonight. For Tuesday, southwest winds 20 to 30 knots,
becoming west. Waves 2 to 4 feet expected tonight, building to
3 to 5 feet on Tuesday.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Geneva-on-the-Lake OH
to Ripley NY.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
